name: UFO Invasion (Chewbacan)
description:
Welcome to the ultimate battle against extraterrestrial invaders! In this adrenaline-pumping game, you play the role of a courageous defender tasked with protecting a city from an imminent alien attack. The sky is filled with hordes of menacing UFOs that are relentless in their quest to destroy everything in their path. It's up to you to stop them in their tracks!

With each passing level, the stakes get higher and the enemies get tougher. You'll need to call upon all of your wits and skills to emerge victorious against the alien horde and protect the city from destruction. Are you ready to save the world? Play now and find out!

[[CONTROLS]]

LMB Mouse (Left Mouse Button).
